attributes.action: arrange for honors to be awarded to all the soldiers taking part in below operation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Quote from the BBC news "have your say"

112 UK soldiers rescued 16 Gurkha's trapped by the Taliban. Estimated number of Taliban in area 2000 +
Against these odds, the soldiers went in without any 2nd thought and rescued all 16 without loss or injury

I am not a relative and know none of the above but I think they deserve to be honored

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
